root.message: The REL_CAL_POLICY field for indicator 16-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: II quarter year n+1 (data for year n-1). For instance, data for year of data 2022 are collected in III-IV quarter 2023 and released in II quarter 2024.

Publicación de datos:

Segundo trimestre de 2017 (datos de 2015)

Выпуск данных:

Второй квартал 2017 года (данные за 2015 год)
